meanings.definition: The material used for covering floors.
meanings.sent1: The floorings in the kitchen are made of tiles.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various types of floorings like hardwood and carpet.
meanings.sent3: I slipped on the wet floorings and almost fell!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was the floorings of her success in interior design.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant floorings of the children's playroom brightened up the entire house.

meanings.definition: The act of providing a floor surface.
meanings.sent1: Proper floorings ensure a safe and comfortable walking surface.
meanings.sent2: The floorings of the gym were specially designed to absorb impact.
meanings.sent3: The extravagant floorings at the party venue impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent4: The floorings of the stage were adorned with colorful patterns for the performance.
meanings.sent5: The elegant floorings of the ballroom added a touch of luxury to the event.

meanings.definition: The process of installing or repairing floors.
meanings.sent1: The floorings of the house were expertly installed by the skilled workers.
meanings.sent2: He learned the techniques of floorings during his apprenticeship.
meanings.sent3: The floorings project took longer than expected due to unforeseen complications.
meanings.sent4: The floorings renovation transformed the old house into a modern living space.
meanings.sent5: The floorings installation required precision and attention to detail.
